channel.title: 718 need help with my shops
channel.description:
my current shops i had to add a fix because i couldn't fix the fact that they were able to be kept duping out of the current shops i have now you have to drag a item into your inv to buy it and the problem with that is that players are complaining about not being able to buy thing like runes and arrows ect along with noted items can anyone help me maybe make a method so that players can buy the arrows and stuff and still use the drag and drop buy method or can someone help me add a normal regular shop but fixed?
PLEASE ADD ME ON SKYPE! IF YOU CAN HELP! @ PURECOOLBOW1
